line_1: From the streak'd east, the radiant Orb unveils,
line_2: Yes, thou shalt smile again! — Time always heals,

line_1: From the streak'd east, the radiant Orb unveils,
line_2: To warring winds, and to their furious peals

line_1: From the streak'd east, the radiant Orb unveils,
line_2: The settling billows tremble — Morning steals
